achievements.title: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon for AI Agent and RAG Winner
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.

achievements.title: Oracle Financial Services Software Enhancements
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions and enhanced the UI for the Individual Assessment module, processing over 300k customer records and reducing execution times by 20%.

achievements.title: National Renewable Energy Laboratory Contributions
achievements.description: Repaired model build pipeline failures, optimized system scalability, and automated DevOps processes through restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions.

achievements.title: Embedded C++ Developer Role
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor devices and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data.

achievements.title: Python Developer at COEP
achievements.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python, achieving a processing speed of 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy.
